thread.title: BRIEF-Penn Virginia Announces Retirement Of Executive Chairman And Appointment Of New Members Of The Board Of Directors

title: BRIEF-Penn Virginia Announces Retirement Of Executive Chairman And Appointment Of New Members Of The Board Of Directors

organizations.name: brief-penn virginia announces retirement of executive cha
brief-penn virginia announces retirement of executive

text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Penn Virginia Corp:
* PENN VIRGINIA ANNOUNCES RETIREMENT OF EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN AND APPOINTMENT OF NEW MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
* PENN VIRGINIA CORP - COMPANY ALSO ANNOUNCED EXPANSION OF ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS FROM FIVE TO SEVEN MEMBERS
* PENN VIRGINIA CORP - HARRY QUARLS WILL RETIRE FROM HIS POSITIONS AS EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN, DIRECTOR, EFFECTIVE FEB 28, 2018
* PENN VIRGINIA CORP - UPON QUARLSâ€™ RETIREMENT, BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL BE REDUCED FROM SEVEN MEMBERS TO SIX MEMBERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
